title: TradAir Adds Mark Tannetta as Director of Sales – EMEA
text:
TradAir Adds Mark Tannetta as Director of Sales – EMEA TradAir Adds Mark Tannetta as Director of Sales – EMEA In his new role, Mr. Tannetta will be focused on developing and expanding the group’s sales capabilities in the UK and beyond. Advertising Print This Post 
TradAir has once again bolstered its sales group, this time adding Mark Tannetta as its newest London-based Director of Sales – Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA), according to information made public on his LinkedIn profile. 
In his new role as the Director of Sales – EMEA at TradAir, Mr. Tannetta will be focused on developing and expanding the group’s sales capabilities in the UK and beyond. He joins TradAir from Caplin Systems, having worked there as its Vice President (VP) – EMEA, dating back to 2010. 
Furthermore, he has worked in a number of sales level roles in the financial services and foreign exchange (FX) industry, including European Sales at Quod Financial and Corporate Sales at HiFX, among others. 
Back in June, TradAir tapped financial services veteran, Mark Foulger, as its Director of Sales – EMEA. Mr. Foulger joined TradAir after a decade in the financial services industry. Most recently he worked at Integral Development Corporation, having served as its Vice President of Sales – EMEA, dating back to mid 2013. He has cut his teeth in a number of other senior sales roles at firms such as London Capital Group (LCG), GFT UK, and CMC Markets. 
TradAir is a trading infrastructure provider for the financial services industry. The group relies on a modular system that is based on HTML5.
